Title: Benchmarking Method for Product Selection
Content: The benchmarking method involves analyzing successful competitors to identify potential products for your store. This method is particularly effective for identifying trending products in competitive markets. Start by selecting a few successful stores in your niche and monitor their new product releases and bestsellers. Focus on stores that frequently update their inventory and have multiple best-selling items. This indicates a high turnover and a good understanding of market trends. Avoid stores that only sell a single product or have low sales volumes, as they may not provide valuable insights. By following this method, you can quickly identify products with high demand and replicate their success in your store.

Title: Category Method for Product Discovery
Content: The category method involves exploring different product categories on platforms like Taobao to discover potential products. This method is useful when you have no specific product ideas and need inspiration. Start by browsing the main categories on Taobao's homepage and drill down into subcategories. Look for products that are popular but not overly saturated. Pay attention to niche products that have a steady demand but fewer competitors. For example, within the 'Toys' category, you might find specific educational toys that are trending. This method allows you to uncover unique products that can differentiate your store from competitors. It requires thorough research and a keen eye for emerging trends.

Title: Using Ranking Tools for Product Selection
Content: Ranking tools like Chanxiao Hong and Kuizhun can help you identify popular products based on sales data and user engagement. These tools provide insights into which products are currently trending and have high sales volumes. To use these tools, search for products within your niche and analyze their performance metrics. Look for products with high sales, positive reviews, and strong user engagement. Additionally, consider using the 'Low-Fan Explosive Articles' feature to find products that have high engagement despite having a small following. This indicates a high potential for growth. While some of these tools may require a subscription, they can significantly streamline the product selection process and increase your chances of success.
